item.description:
This has been generally for Advanced Beginners to MODERATE hikers - BEGINNERS may come however please be physically fit enough to walk multiple rocky hills for about 2.5 miles. Email me if you have any questions.

We are meeting at the Blue Hills Reservation Headquarters (address above). You can park in the parking lot across from the State Police Station.

We'll head up the South Skyline trail to the top of Great Blue Hill, take a short break by catching the evening Boston skyline, and then head back down the North Skyline trail back to our cars. On average, this hike has taken about 1.5 hours.

We are going to have beautiful weather tomorrow so it's a great day for a scenic hike! Also, I may be up for an additional hike in the area after that if anyone is interested.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be in a Gray Nissan Altima - Cell: 774-218-1626
item.name: Saturday 10/9/10 Hike to Great Blue Hill
